original_text: That day is a day of wrath, a day of trouble and distress, a day of wasteness and desolation, a day of darkness and gloominess, a day of clouds and thick darkness,
korean_text: 그날은 분노의 날이요 환난과 고통의 날이요 황폐와 패망의 날이요 캄캄하고 어두운 날이요 구름과 흑암의 날이요

sentences.original_text: That day is a day of wrath
a day of trouble and distress
a day of wasteness and desolation
a day of darkness and gloominess
a day of clouds and thick darkness
